by: Jan Willem Knopper

In this talk it will be described how these problems are solved in the MathDox software (LGPL, see http://mathdox.org/player/). After that some examples of interactive mathematical documents and interactive exercises will be shown.

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 25, 2008
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2008, MathDox, Interactive Mathematical Documents on the Web, Jan Willem Knopper
